org.jlab.mya

Class Metadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.mya.Metadata

  • public final class Metadata
extends Object
    The metadata associated with an EPICS PV. The metadata is the "key" required to query for events since it reveals what host to query and what underlying ID to query.
    Author:
    slominskir

    • Constructor Detail

      • Metadata

        public Metadata(int id,
                String name,
                String host,
                DataType type,
                int size)
        Create a new Metadata.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique database ID assigned to the PV
        name - The PV name
        host - The host on which events are stored for this PV
        type - The data type
        size - The size of an update (scalar = 1, vector > 1)
